pullRequest.title: Adding heal amount expression
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
This Pull Request adds the expression to retrieve and modify the amount of regained health of an entity, which can only be used in an on heal event.

Target Minecraft Versions: any
Requirements: none
Related Issues: #3337

nodes.bodyText: The amount of a healing event sounds weird, how about the amount of health healed in a healing event?
Also, is which can be changed actually necessary? Lots of expressions are changeable, but it's not explicitly specified.
I believe you can return CollectionUtils.array(Number.class) here
Why would SET be equal to DELETE here?

commit.message: ExprHealAmount - Changes due to code reviews

nodes.bodyText: only tiny little nitpick, but there shouldn't be a space here.
